类的使用
cn.sliew.milky.cache.ohc.OhcCacheOptions

    • cn.sliew.milky.cache.ohc中OhcCacheOptions的使用

      返回OhcCacheOptions的cn.sliew.milky.cache.ohc中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.capacity(long capacity)
      Sets cache capacity of the cache in bytes.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.chunkSize(int chunkSize)
      Sets cache chunk size.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.defaultTTLmillis(Long defaultTTLmillis)
      Sets cache TTL in milliseconds.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.edenSize(Double edenSize)
      Size of the eden generation used by W-WinyLFU relative to a segment's size default 0.2.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.fixedKeySize(Integer fixedKeySize)
      If set and positive, the chunked implementation with fixed sized entries will be used.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.fixedValueSize(Integer fixedValueSize)
      If set and positive, the chunked implementation with fixed sized entries will be used.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.frequencySketchSize(Integer frequencySketchSize)
      Size of the frequency sketch used by W-WinyLFU.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.hashAlgorighm(org.caffinitas.ohc.HashAlgorithm hashAlgorighm)
      Sets cache internal hash algorithm.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.hashTableSize(int hashTableSize)
      Sets cache initial size of each segment's hash table.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.keySerializer(org.caffinitas.ohc.CacheSerializer<K> keySerializer)
      Sets cache keys serializer implementation.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.loadFactor(Float loadFactor)
      Sets cache hash table load factor which determines when rehashing occurs.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.maxEntrySize(Long maxEntrySize)
      Sets cache maximum size of a hash entry (including header, serialized key + serialized value) defaults to capacity divided by number of segments.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.segmentCount(int segmentCount)
      Sets cache number of segments.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.throwOOME(Boolean throwOOME)
      Sets cache whether throw OutOfMemoryError if off-heap allocation fails.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.ticker(org.caffinitas.ohc.Eviction eviction)
      Choose the eviction algorithm to use.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.ticker(org.caffinitas.ohc.Ticker ticker)
      Indirection for current time - used for unit tests.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.timeouts(Boolean timeouts)
      Sets cache timeouts.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.timeoutsPrecision(Integer timeoutsPrecision)
      Sets cache amount of time in milliseconds for each timeouts-slot - compare with hashed wheel timer.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.timeoutsSlots(Integer timeoutsSlots)
      Sets cache number of timeouts slots for each segment - compare with hashed wheel timer.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.unlocked(Boolean unlocked)
      Sets cache internal unlocked.
      OhcCacheOptions<K,V> OhcCacheOptions.valueSerializer(org.caffinitas.ohc.CacheSerializer<V> valueSerializer)
      Sets cache values serializer implementation.
      参数类型为OhcCacheOptions的cn.sliew.milky.cache.ohc中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      OhcCache(OhcCacheOptions<K,V> options)
